attributes.action: MP Cull: A cull on Hypocrites and Procrastinators.
attributes.additional_details:
A call for the governemnt, to start serving the people of the UK. Once in office they tend to lose touch with 'reality', forget their 'policies', and serve 'big business' and 'image makers'.
They take more and more and provide less and less.
They blatantly support, tax evaders, and tax the poor.
They seem to be incapable of providing for future generations, or making decisions that will benefit the citizens of the UK. Preferring knee jerk reactions, manipulated by the media, rather than 'common sense policies'.
They refuse to support independent businesses, in any real sense, aside from rhetoric, creating the decimation of High Streets, in favour of corporate homogenisation, STILL. They must be stopped from talking and start implementing, real solutions to real problems, not cow tow to what clearly does not benefit society as a whole.
